title: Fix Settings Menu Bugs
message:
Fix Settings Menu Bugs

- Fixes bugs with settings options
- Formats MainActivity a bit better and adds some comments in.

title: Add License, Settings
message:
Add License, Settings

Implements the settings menu, moves port selection
into that menu. Adds licensing headers.

title: Fix Freeze, Add README & License
message:
Fix Freeze, Add README & License

Fixes a freeze when you press back immediately after
launching the application.

title: Implement full wakelock
message:
Implement full wakelock

Partial wakelock really wasn't fixing the slowdown
issue. This patch implements an easily modifiable,
settable wakelock and sets it to full screen wakelock.

To prevent the downlink from being disabled by a screen
tap in flight, the app requires a long-press on the stop button
to enact a stop now.

title: Implement partial wakelock
message:
Implement partial wakelock

Implements partial wakelock which
reduces the CPU lagdown that is occurring
when the screen goes off. It is still present though.

title: Improves Endpoint Robustness
message:
Improves Endpoint Robustness

This patch focuses on improving link reliability.
There should be pretty much no way to lose the
TCP side of the downlink once activated now. It
also improves the UI by forcing the user to launch the
app by plugging in the device, getting rid of the
annoying security requests by the android
subsystem.

title: Bring USB Serial Library into codebase
message:
Bring USB Serial Library into codebase

Some modifications needed to be made to hoho's
android usb/serial library since they really dont support
APM communication very well and spam the living hell
out of the log. This fixes those problems and brings
the raw source into the project.

title: Adds in UI status indicators
message:
Adds in UI status indicators

- Adds in msg received, downlink/mav status indicators
- Adds in reporter functions for the IOEndpoints to talk to the UI
- Restructures how connections are made
- Fixes a bug where the device never disconnects from the endpoint server.

title: Initial Commit
message:
Initial Commit

Working program - no status text and
does not disconnect properly.
